snippet: Defending champion Serena Williams and No. 5-ranked Maria Sharapova were drawn into the same section for the Australian Open on Friday, setting up a potential quarterfinal match featuring the 2015 finalists....
lead_paragraph: Defending champion Serena Williams and No. 5-ranked Maria Sharapova were drawn into the same section for the Australian Open on Friday, setting up a potential quarterfinal match featuring the 2015 finalists.

headline.print_headline: Serena Williams, Sharapova in Same Quarter at Aussie Open
headline.main: Serena Williams, Sharapova in Same Quarter at Aussie Open
